org.antfarmer.ejce

Class AbstractValueEncryptor<T extends AbstractValueEncryptor<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.antfarmer.ejce.AbstractEncryptor<T>
      • org.antfarmer.ejce.AbstractValueEncryptor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the concrete type of this encryptor object.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    EncryptorInterface<T>, ValueEncryptorInterface<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Encryptor

    public abstract class AbstractValueEncryptor<T extends AbstractValueEncryptor<T>>
extends AbstractEncryptor<T>
implements ValueEncryptorInterface<T>
    Abstract class for encrypting/decrypting text and other values.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractValueEncryptor()
      Initializes the AbstractValueEncryptor with a HexEncoder used for encoding/decoding byte arrays, and a default charset of UTF-8.
      AbstractValueEncryptor(TextEncoder textEncoder)
      Initializes the AbstractValueEncryptor with the given TextEncoder used for encoding/decoding byte arrays, and a default charset of UTF-8.
      AbstractValueEncryptor(TextEncoder textEncoder, Charset charset)
      Initializes the AbstractValueEncryptor with the given TextEncoder and Charset used for encoding/decoding byte arrays.

        Initializes the AbstractValueEncryptor with the given TextEncoder used for encoding/decoding byte arrays, and a default charset of UTF-8.
        Parameters:
        textEncoder - the TextEncoder used for encoding/decoding byte arrays

      • AbstractValueEncryptor

        public AbstractValueEncryptor(TextEncoder textEncoder,
                              Charset charset)
        Initializes the AbstractValueEncryptor with the given TextEncoder and Charset used for encoding/decoding byte arrays.
        Parameters:
        textEncoder - the TextEncoder used for encoding/decoding byte arrays
        charset - Charset to be used during encryption/decryption

      • decrypt

        public String decrypt(String text)
               throws GeneralSecurityException
        Returns the decoded and decrypted text for the given text representation. This method will only work with data encrypted using the encrypt method.

      • encryptLong

        public String encryptLong(Long number)
                   throws GeneralSecurityException
        Returns an encrypted and encoded text representation of the given long. This is generally the most efficient means of encrypting a long, as the byte representation is used for encryption rather than the string representation.

                     throws GeneralSecurityException,
                            IOException,
                            ClassNotFoundException
        Returns the decoded and decrypted object for the given text representation, using the given Key. This method will only work with data encrypted using the encryptObject method.
        Specified by:
        decryptObject in interface ValueEncryptorInterface<T extends AbstractValueEncryptor<T>>
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be decrypted
        key - the decryption key
        Returns:
        a decrypted and decoded version of the object
